events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of March 9th, requesting to file a claim for damages.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial report and vehicle details provided by the claimant.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the claim to assist the customer throughout the process and provide updates regularly.
The claim was acknowledged promptly by the insurance company, confirming receipt and initiating the assessment phase.
Customer was requested to submit police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damage for further investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple photos showing the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation into the collision circumstances has started, including verifying the police report and liability determination.
Investigation completed, confirming the accident details and that the claimant is entitled to coverage under the policy.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the vehicle as well as a rental car for the downtime.
The customer provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the promptness and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was approved officially and the insurance company confirmed payment will be issued within the week.
Payment has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated account covering the full agreed repair amount and rental reimbursements.
The claim was formally closed after all payments and obligations were fulfilled, with a follow-up scheduled to ensure customer satisfaction.
All case files and correspondence related to the auto accident claim were archived securely for future reference.
